title: 19. "Moment 4 Life" How Staying Present can be Transformational for Your Life
description:
Last time we talked about the highest self. This time we are talking about channelling the highest self to help you stay present, to help you worry less about the things of old and the things that are yet to come, and as always to help you live a more expansive life. Tune in! I'll see you on the other side!

Click here to get my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

...or click here to get a preview first :) 

 

Book of the Month mentioned: The Untethered Soul by Michael A. Singer 

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
